prod_desc: Battle the Vermillion to win the Fast Forward Time Blade!
prod_long_desc:
Stage a swamp battle between Kai and Vermillion warriors Rivett and Slackjaw to win the Forward Time Blade. This LEGO® NINJAGO® set features a Vermillion egg with an explode function that releases three red snake elements from inside, plus cool minifigure weapons to dial up the role-play conflict. Includes three minifigures.
Includes three minifigures: Kai, Rivett and Slackjaw
Vermillion egg build features an egg with a translucent red snake slime element, secret explode function and three red snake elements inside, plus various elements including swamp reeds and the detachable translucent-green Forward Time Blade.
Activate the explode function to blast off the top of the egg and pop out the snakes.
Weapons include Kai’s katana, Rivett’s Vermillion axe and Slackjaw’s Vermillion sword.
Accessory elements include Rivett and Slackjaw’s Vermillion helmets, plus two extra red snake elements.
Recreate and role-play epic scenes from the NINJAGO® Masters of Spinjitzu TV show.
This set offers an age-appropriate build and play experience for ages 6+.
Vermillion egg measures over 3” high, 2” wide and 2” long.
